wikipedia_page.main: George Frederick Buchan Scott (born 6 November 1995) is an English cricketer who plays for Gloucestershire County Cricket Club. An all-rounder, who is a right-handed batsman, and bowls right-arm medium pace. After a schoolboy career at St Albans Boys School, Scott made his first-class debut for Leeds Bradford MCCU against Sussex County Cricket Club in April 2015.At the end of the 2019 season, Scott turned down the offer of a new contract at Middlesex to join Gloucestershire on a three-year deal.His brother, Charlie, has also played first-class cricket.
